variable.name: awsw_i1
variable.description: Using the choices below, select how often the following things have happened during the past month . Never - has not happened Once in Awhile - happened 20% of the time Sometimes - happened 40% of the time Quite Often - happened 60% of the time Frequently, if not always - happened 80% of the time Always - happened 100% of the time Questions 1 - 3 are only about you Going to Bed at bedtime

variable.name: awsw_i2
variable.description: When its time to go to bed...

variable.name: awsw_1
variable.description: 1. ...I want to stay up and do other things (for example: watch TV, play video games, or talk on the phone).

variable.name: awsw_i3
variable.description: In general...

variable.name: awsw_2
variable.description: 2. ...I am ready to go to bed at bedtime.

variable.name: awsw_3
variable.description: 3. ...I try to "put off" or delay going to bed.

variable.name: awsw_i4
variable.description: Questions 4 & 5 are only about you Falling Asleep after "lights-out" When it's time to go to sleep (lights-out)...

variable.name: awsw_4
variable.description: 4. ...I have trouble settling down.

variable.name: awsw_i5
variable.description: In general...

variable.name: awsw_5
variable.description: 5. ...I need help getting to sleep (for example: I need to listen to music, watch TV, take medication, or have someone else in the bed with me).

variable.name: awsw_i6
variable.description: Questions 6-8 are only about you Going back to sleep after waking during the night After waking up during the night...

variable.name: awsw_6
variable.description: 6. ... I have trouble going back to sleep.

variable.name: awsw_7
variable.description: 7. ...I have trouble getting comfortable.

variable.name: awsw_8
variable.description: 8. ... I need help to go back to sleep (for example: I need to watch TV, read, or sleep with another person).

variable.name: awsw_i7
variable.description: Questions 9 & 10 are only about you Waking in the morning In the morning, I wake up...

variable.name: awsw_9
variable.description: 9. ...and feel ready to get up for the day.

variable.name: awsw_10
variable.description: 10. ...feeling rested and alert.

variable.name: awsw_i8
variable.description: The next set of questions has to do with your usual schedule on WEEKDAYS when you go to school.

variable.name: awsw_11
variable.description: What time do you usually go to bed on weekdays?

variable.name: awsw_11a
variable.description: Enter what time you usually go to bed on weekdays:

variable.name: awsw_12
variable.description: What time do you usually wake up on weekdays?

variable.name: awsw_12a
variable.description: Enter what time you usually wake up on weekdays:

variable.name: awsw_i9
variable.description: The next set of questions has to do with your usual schedule on WEEKENDS or during the summer when you don't go to school.

variable.name: awsw_13
variable.description: What time do you usually go to bed on weekends?

variable.name: awsw_13a
variable.description: Enter what time you usually go to bed on weekends:

variable.name: awsw_14
variable.description: What time do you usually wake up on weekends?

variable.name: awsw_14a
variable.description: Enter what time you usually wake up on weekends:
